name: Su From So
summary: A very fun, silly, and grounded comedy. But I'm afraid a good amount of my enjoyment was because of my coastal Karnataka upbringing.
pros: Coastal Kannada is fun. Very grounded movie.
Paper thin plot, but works well in this setting
cons: I don't think you'd enjoy this as much as I did if you're not used to coastal Kannada
For a movie with a very thin plot, this length felt a bit long?
Because I did not watch this in a theatre, I felt the repetitive gags felt a bit unnecessary and dragged
